content: कालिंद {%<ab>a.</ab>%} (दी|{%<ab>f.</ab>%}) [कलिंद-अण्] Connected with or coming from the mountain Kalinda or the river Yamunā. --दी {@--1@} The river Yamunā; कालिंद्याः पुलिनेषु केलिकुपिताम् <ls>Ve. 1. 2</ls>; <ls>R. 15. 28</ls>; <ls>Śānti. 4. 13.</ls> {@--2@} A sort of vessel. {@--3@} <ab>N.</ab> of a wife of Kṛṣṇa. --दं A water melon.
